column4: hi all, i was trying out a ubuntu alternative install (cli only) earlier to try and only install cinnamon as my de, but i failed to get any gui working. what's the best way of installing a gui for a cli only install?
i'd start with apt-get install gnome-shell and pray :P
haha, im trying to erase gnome from my life. 3 years of a linux haitus, and all hell goes to loose in the world of desktop enviorment
you want to erase gnome and go to cinnamon...
